snippet: Starting with a dinner in 2002 that Mr. Trump’s sister set up, he and the New Jersey governor established a relationship that led to an endorsement.
abstract: Businessman and presidential candidate Donald J Trump and New Jersey Gov Chris Christie have personal relationship that spans 14 years; similarities between men and their dealings discussed.
lead_paragraph: Starting with a dinner in 2002 that Mr. Trump’s sister set up, he and the New Jersey governor established a relationship that led to an endorsement.

headline.main: For Chris Christie and Donald Trump, Ties Go Back Years
headline.print_headline: For Christie and Trump, Ties Go Back Years Before Endorsement
